title: Question:
author: Mst.Wangdan$
content: On the occasion of Armed Forces Day, I extend my sincere greetings and congratulations to all the members of the Bangladesh Army, Navy and Air Force.Â  Wishing all members of the armed forces and their families continued happiness, peace and prosperity.Â Armed forces are a nation's proud institution built of indomitable courage, bravery, valor and discipline.Â  The heroic role of this army in our great liberation war will be written in golden letters in history.Â  Patriotic members of the armed forces continue to play the role of vigilant guards in protecting our freedom-sovereignty and geographical integrity.Â  Their role in maintaining world peace is appreciated in the world community.Â  The members of our armed forces serving in the United Nations peacekeeping forces are bringing the reputation of the country with their efficiency and high level of professionalism.Â  Even in all the natural calamities of the country, the armed forces stand by the side of the afflicted people and jump to face the difficult crisis. Former President Shahid Ziaur Rahman, the promulgator of independence, undertook and implemented comprehensive programs aimed at developing the Bangladesh Armed Forces into a modern, dynamic and efficient professional force.Â  Today I pay deep respect to his memory.Â  I remember with humble respect Bir Shrestha Sepoy Mustafa Kamal, Bir Shrestha Captain Mohiuddin Jahangir, Bir Shrestha Sepoy Hamidur Rahman, Bir Shrestha Ruhul Amin, Bir Shrestha Flight Lieutenant Matiur Rahman, Bir Shrestha Lance Naik Noor Mohammad Sheikh and Bir Shrestha Lance Naiksi Abdur Rauf who gave their lives in the Liberation War. whoÂ  Since the time of former President Shahid Zia, the Bangladesh Armed Forces have become a well-disciplined, fast and ever-active modern force, which is at par with the army of any modern country in the world.Â  Later, with the government led by the former Prime Minister Begum Khaleda Zia, the armed forces made progress in the continuous implementation of the programs adopted by Shahid Zia, and made the armed forces more modernized and strengthened.Â  Our efforts will continue in the future.Â I wish all the programs of Armed Forces Day all success.Â Allah Hafez, Long live Bangladesh. ðŸŒ¾ðŸŒ¾ðŸŒ¾ðŸŒ¾ðŸŒ¾ðŸŒ¾ðŸ’ª
